lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Isab.

lines.speaker: Duk.
lines.text: And now, deere Maide, be you as free to vs.

lines.text: Your Brothers death I know sits at your heart:

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.
lines.text: Which I did thinke, with slower foot came on,

lines.text: That brain'd my purpose: but peace be with him,

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.

lines.speaker: Duk.
lines.text: Like doth quit like, and {% italic: Measure %} still for {% italic: Measure %}:

lines.speaker: Duk.
lines.text: Which though thou would'st deny, denies thee vantage.

lines.speaker: Mar.
lines.text: Oh my most gracious Lord,

lines.text: Oh my deere Lord,

lines.speaker: Isab.
